mapper.sql: id, name, summary, org_id, doctor_ids, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, o.orgName as hospital FROM tb_physical_therapy p LEFT JOIN sys_org o ON p.org_id = o.id ORDER BY p.update_time DESC
mapper.insert: insert into tb_physical_therapy (id, name, summary, org_id, doctor_ids, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
